text: Phir bhi agar yeh aap say jhagren to aap keh den kay mein aur meray tabey daaron ney Allah Taalaa kay samney apna sir tasleem khum ker diya hai aur ehal-e-kitab say aur un-parh logon say keh dijiye! Kay kiya tum bhi itaâ€™at kertay ho? Pus agar yeh bhi tabye daar bann jayen to yaqeenan hidayat walay hain aur agar yeh roo gardani keren to aap per sirf phoncha dena hai aur Allah bandon ko khoob dekh bhaal raha hai
